product_name: Haiku Blossom II Sling Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Sporting a casual design, the women's Haiku Blossom II Sling Bag can be slung over either shoulder to free up your hands as you shop, travel or explore city streets. The eco-friendly shoulder sling bag is made completely of recycled PET and measures 18 x 7 x 2 in. Roomy main compartment zips closed for security; front flap pocket snaps closed. Haiku Blossom II Sling Bag also features 2 exterior zip front and 2 exterior zip back pockets for great versatility; Internal zip pocket, too. Strap length adjusts from 27 - 51 in. and can be unclipped completely. Closeout.
short_description: Sporting a casual design, the women's Haiku Blossom II Sling Bag can be slung over either shoulder to free up your hands as you shop, travel or explore city streets.
